verses.text: \w In|strong="H1732"\w* you, O Lord, \w have|strong="H1732"\w* I put \w my|strong="H1732"\w* hope; let me never \w be|strong="H1732"\w* shamed; keep me safe \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* righteousness.

\w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* ear \w be|strong="H0408"\w* turned \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5769"\w*; \w take|strong="H2620"\w* \w me|strong="H5769"\w* quickly out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* danger; \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* strong Rock, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* place \w of|strong="H3068"\w* strength where \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* safe.

\w For|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0413"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w Rock|strong="H6697"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w strong|strong="H4581"\w* tower; \w go|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* front \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* guide, \w because|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H5186"\w* name.

Take \w me|strong="H5148"\w* out \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w net|strong="H4686"\w* which \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* \w put|strong="H5148"\w* ready \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5148"\w* secretly; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H0859"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* strength.

\w Into|strong="H3318"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* hands \w I|strong="H3588"\w* give \w my|strong="H3318"\w* spirit; \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H0859"\w* \w my|strong="H3318"\w* saviour, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* Lord God \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever true.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* full \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hate \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w those|strong="H0853"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* go after false \w gods|strong="H0410"\w*; \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* hope \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* glad \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* delight \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*; \w because|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0413"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* seen \w my|strong="H8104"\w* trouble; \w you|strong="H0413"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* pity \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* soul \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w its|strong="H8104"\w* sorrows;

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H5315"\w* \w given|strong="H8055"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w into|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* hand \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* hater; \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* put \w my|strong="H7200"\w* feet \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* wide place.

\w Have|strong="H3027"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5462"\w*, O Lord, \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w in|strong="H5975"\w* trouble; \w my|strong="H3027"\w* eyes \w are|strong="H3027"\w* wasted \w with|strong="H3027"\w* grief, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am wasted \w in|strong="H5975"\w* soul \w and|strong="H3027"\w* body.

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* goes \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* sorrow, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* years \w in|strong="H3068"\w* weeping; \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* almost gone \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* sin, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* bones \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w wasted|strong="H6244"\w* \w away|strong="H6244"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w all|strong="H3615"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H6106"\w* against \w me|strong="H3615"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* become \w a|strong="H3588"\w* word \w of|strong="H8141"\w* shame \w to|strong="H8141"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* neighbours; \w a|strong="H3588"\w* cause \w of|strong="H8141"\w* shaking \w the|strong="H3588"\w* head \w and|strong="H8141"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* fear \w to|strong="H8141"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* friends: \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* saw \w me|strong="H3615"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* street went \w in|strong="H8141"\w* flight \w from|strong="H6106"\w* \w me|strong="H3615"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w gone|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* men's minds \w and|strong="H7200"\w* memory \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* dead \w man|strong="H3605"\w*; \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* broken vessel.

False statements against \w me|strong="H7911"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* ears; fear \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* every side: \w they|strong="H3820"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* talking together against \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, designing \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* away \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w life|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* faith \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H8085"\w* Lord; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w*, \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* God.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* chances \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* life \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* hand; take \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* hands \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* haters, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* go \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H6256"\w* \w your|strong="H3027"\w* servant see \w the|strong="H3027"\w* light \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3027"\w* face; \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3027"\w* mercy \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* saviour.

Let \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w not|strong="H3467"\w* \w be|strong="H5650"\w* shamed, O \w Lord|strong="H2617"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* made \w my|strong="H5921"\w* prayer \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*; let \w the|strong="H6440"\w* sinners \w be|strong="H5650"\w* shamed, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* let \w their|strong="H5921"\w* mouths \w be|strong="H5650"\w* shut \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* underworld.

\w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* false lips \w be|strong="H0408"\w* shut, which say \w evil|strong="H7563"\w* against \w the|strong="H3588"\w* upright, looking \w down|strong="H7121"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* pride.

O how great \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* grace, which \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H1696"\w* put \w in|strong="H5921"\w* store \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* worshippers, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* which \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H1696"\w* \w made|strong="H1696"\w* clear \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H6662"\w* had faith \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sons \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H6662"\w*!

\w You|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w keep|strong="H6845"\w* \w them|strong="H5048"\w* safe \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H0834"\w* house \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* designs \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*; \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w secret|strong="H6845"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H0834"\w* tent \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w keep|strong="H6845"\w* \w them|strong="H5048"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* angry tongues.

\w May|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Lord \w be|strong="H0376"\w* praised, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H0376"\w* \w has|strong="H0376"\w* made clear \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wonder \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* grace \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H0376"\w* strong town.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H1288"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* said \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* fear, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* cut off \w from|strong="H3068"\w* before \w your|strong="H3068"\w* eyes; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* gave ear \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* prayer, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* cry went up \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w O|strong="H8085"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* love \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord, all \w you|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* saints; \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord keeps safe \w from|strong="H8085"\w* danger all those \w who|strong="H0559"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* true \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* gives \w the|strong="H0559"\w* workers \w of|strong="H6963"\w* pride \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w right|strong="H5869"\w* reward.

\w Put|strong="H0539"\w* \w away|strong="H3605"\w* fear \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let \w your|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w be|strong="H3068"\w* strong, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w whose|strong="H3605"\w* hope \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
